welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hiroshima, a city known for its rich history, beautiful landscapes, and resilient spirit. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in its charm and discover all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Momiji-tei (もみじ亭)
restaurants.description: Momiji-tei (もみじ亭) is a okonomiyaki restaurant located in 広島市.
restaurants.address: 中区紙屋町2-3-10 (ルービンス紙屋町ビル 3F), 広島市, 広島県, 730-0031

restaurants.name: 板蕎麦香り家
restaurants.description: 板蕎麦香り家 is a soba restaurant located in 広島市.

restaurants.name: おっくん堂大手町本店
restaurants.description: おっくん堂大手町本店 is a ramen restaurant located in 広島市.
restaurants.address: 中区大手町3-3-3 (さんさんビル 1F), 広島市, 広島県, 730-0051

restaurants.name: Nagata-ya (長田屋)
restaurants.description: Nagata-ya (長田屋) is a okonomiyaki restaurant located in 広島市.
restaurants.address: 中区大手町1-7-19 (重石ビル 1F), 広島市, 広島県, 731-0051

restaurants.name: Mequl (ゴハンとオヤツ 喫茶めくる)
restaurants.description: Mequl (ゴハンとオヤツ 喫茶めくる) is a café located in 広島市.
restaurants.address: 中区十日市町1-6-29, 広島市, 広島県, 730-0805
